nodes.text: Mealbread was a type of bread which was served in the mess halls of the First Order's Starkiller Base. The four human stormtroopers of the FN Corps ate mealbread alongside slivers of meat and numian cream while training on Starkiller Base, a meal designed more for efficiency than flavor. Stormtrooper FN-2187 used the bread to wipe up the last of the cream of his plate and eat it.

Mealbread first appeared in Republic Commando: Triple Zero, a Star Wars Legends novel written by Karen Traviss and released in 2006. The food was confirmed to be canon when it appeared in the "Finn" section of the anthology book Before the Awakening, which was written by Greg Rucka and released in 2015.
